tool_description: Searches historical texts and corpora for word occurrences across specified time periods and languages, returning contextualized usage examples with metadata.

search_term.description: The word or phrase to search for in historical texts

start_year.description: Starting year for the search period (between -3000 and 2024)

end_year.description: Ending year for the search period (between -3000 and 2024)

languages.description: List of ISO 639-1 language codes to search within

text_types.description: Types of texts to include: literary, legal, religious, scientific, popular

max_results.description: Maximum number of results to return (1-1000)

include_variants.description: Whether to include spelling variants and inflected forms

error_messages: Invalid time range: start_year must be less than end_year and both must be between -3000 and 2024.
Unsupported language code: Use valid ISO 639-1 language codes only.
Invalid text type: Use only [literary, legal, religious, scientific, popular].
Search term too short: Provide a search term with at least 2 characters.
Max results out of range: Set max_results between 1 and 1000.
No texts found: No historical texts available for the specified criteria.
usage: Provide search_term, start_year, end_year, and languages array. Optionally specify text_types, max_results, and include_variants to refine the search scope.

date_range_covered.description: Actual date range of the results found

contexts.description: Array of text passages containing the search term with surrounding context

sources.description: Array of source citations for each context passage

years.description: Array of years corresponding to each occurrence
